data.name: RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Historica
data.detailed_description:
The Fantasy Historica Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that will bring the passion of history with the power of fantasy into a whole new set of compositional pieces! The Pack can be previewed in its entirety at the link below!

This pack contains:

  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.
  • OGG and M4A formats included.

Tracklist:

Ancient Mysteries
Blood of the Old Gods
Chipping Away the Tears
City of the Worlds Desire
Crossing the Seas
Cunning Forest
Eastern Mists
Fine Day for Sacrifice
Gaelic Summers
Hanging Garden Party
Hundred Years War
La Bataile de Iberia
March for the Empire
Mysterious Forest
Old Families
Prelude's March
The Shogunate will Fall
The Seige of Vienna
Village by the Sea
What my Heart Wants

data.short_description: The Fantasy Historica Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that will bring the passion of history with the power of fantasy into a whole new set of compositional pieces!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: System supporting RPG Maker MV

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Historica
